data.actual_result: They don't show up. They only do after you force restart discord.
data.expected_result: You should see the channels on your list. You should be able to reply in the queue.
data.short_description: In the Discord Testers server when receiving a new role, it doesn't load your permissions correctly.
data.steps_to_repro: - Become a bug hunter. - Try to find a channel for the bug hunter(s) - Try to reply in the bug approval queue
